description: System-generated unique identifier for this part’s storage location record within a warehouse.
Foreign key referencing the specific part-at-warehouse stock record this location belongs to.
Foreign key to the warehouse storage bin/shelf/location where the part is stored.
Status code for the part-location record (e.g., active/inactive); specific codes may vary—confirm with SME.
Flag indicating this is the primary/default storage location for the part in the warehouse.
Current on-hand quantity of the part stored at this location, in the part’s stocking unit.
Indicator to send shortage/low-stock alerts for this location; exact behavior and thresholds likely system-defined—confirm with SME.
Flag indicating the location is due for physical inventory counting or cycle count.
Timestamp of the most recent physical inventory count performed at this location.
Free-text notes about the part’s storage at this location.
System-maintained timestamp of the latest update to this record (any source).
Timestamp recorded for the last user-driven change to this record; field naming suggests legacy usage—confirm with SME.
User identifier that created the record, if captured.
Timestamp when the record was created by the user/system.
User identifier who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to the record by a user.
